Sued For Linking To Mp3 S

11 Sep 1999

I normally don't post things from slashdot.org, but this one really caught my attention. It appears a European teen has been sued for linking to mp3 files. Naturally, this sounds ridiculous, but its happening.

\nCheck out the story on slashdot here and the original article here in german.

\nFirst Ticketmaster, now this????
